page.title: 15Housing in Llanelli.
page.content: The majority of the housing in our block is of the terraced type,since our area contains the oldest part of Llanelli.Naturally there are semi-detached and detached houses also and some blocks of flats,but none of the flats have more than three storeys.The flats and many of the houses are owned by the Council,but on the older Council estates many of the houses are now privately owned.New Council Estates are being erected in our area at present,on land once used by industry.The new houses are brick built as are most of those in the block.Until recently,local brick was used,but now all the brick works have closed.Roofs are covered by tiles,and tile roofs are now in the majority over the traditional slate roofs..
